title: Linear Regression Tutorial
text:
Purpose
Linear regression is an essential tool for any statistician, data scientist, or machine learning practitioner. Linear regression is used to model the relationship between a dependent variable and one or more independent variables. Linear regression can be used:
- to make future predictions 
- understand the strength of relationships between variables
- identify trends in data. 
This tutorial will cover the basics of linear regression using Python. To demonstrate, a database containing pricing and size (in square feet) of houses in California will be used. The goal of this tutorial is to predict the price of a house based on its size. ```

### Import necessary libraries

::: {#00b2d55f .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.datasets import fetch_california_housing
:::
The libraries being used are pandas and sklearn. Pandas is a useful library for data modeling and analysis. sklearn contains the dataset we will be using for this tutorial.
